meanings.definition: The season between summer and winter, characterized by cooler temperatures and falling leaves.
meanings.sent1: In autumn, the leaves change color and fall from the trees.
meanings.sent2: I love taking walks in the park during autumn to enjoy the beautiful foliage.
meanings.sent3: During autumn, the trees seem to be shedding their clothes like a never-ending fashion show.
meanings.sent4: The autumn of life is when one reflects on past experiences and embraces wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The crisp air of autumn always reminds me of cozy sweaters and hot cocoa.

meanings.definition: The period of maturity or middle age.
meanings.sent1: As we enter autumn, we gain more life experience and wisdom.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of contentment and fulfillment in her autumn years.
meanings.sent3: Some people fear the autumn of their lives, but it can be a time of great fulfillment.
meanings.sent4: Just like the changing leaves in autumn, we too go through different phases in life.
meanings.sent5: Autumn is a time to reflect on the journey of life and appreciate the growth along the way.
